channel.title: How would i add a shop?
channel.description:
How do i add shops? I've tried looking around these forums but didn't find anything after like 10 searches...
I know how to edit, i just need to know how to add one.

item.title: How would i add a shop?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“Rockin, post:2, topic:302503”]I’m guessing you added the shop in your Shop.cfg.

Next you open of client.java and search “wanneshop”

Once you find something like this:

if(NPCID == ##Numbers here##){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = ##Number here##; }

Make a new one after the }

if(NPCID == Your shop npc ID here){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = shop number from shop.cfg here; }

Hope that helped.[/quote]

I’ll try it, thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: How would i add a shop?

item.title: How would i add a shop?
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

I’m guessing you added the shop in your Shop.cfg.

Next you open of client.java and search “wanneshop”

Once you find something like this:

if(NPCID == ##Numbers here##){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = ##Number here##; }

Make a new one after the }

if(NPCID == Your shop npc ID here){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = shop number from shop.cfg here; }

Hope that helped.
